title: 20 Recipes That Start With Cream of Mushroom Soup
description: Cream of mushroom soup adds richness and creamy texture to a variety of dishes. We rounded up more than a dozen that are worthy of that soup can in your pantry.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 20 Recipes That Start With Cream of Mushroom Soup By Isadora Baum Updated on September 12, 2024 Close Credits: Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cream of mushroom soup is a great ingredient when you're seeking a silky, smooth, velvety texture in a variety of dishes, like casseroles, soups, or rich sauces for chicken and beef. It has that thick, creamy consistency that makes it oh-so-appealing and indulgent for those looking for something decadent tasting. Mushrooms actually have great nutrition, like fiber, protein, and magnesium, which makes it an all-star food and a wonderful pantry staple to keep in hand for quick weeknight meals. Here are a few recipes that start with a cream of mushroom soup. 01 of 21 Simple Hamburger Stroganoff Melissa Goff This stroganoff recipe is packed with beef and cheese flavors and tastes just like a cheeseburger. The cream of mushroom soup ties it all together in a thick, gooey texture. It's so easy, without worrying to prepare beef tips, steak, or roast beef. And it's done in just 30 quick minutes. View Recipe Save 02 of 21 Cheddar Mushroom Pork Steaks These pork steaks have delicious, creamy cheddar and mushrooms to give them a stick-to-your-bones heartiness. Add in fresh herbs, like basil and oregano, to give the dish a more herbal seasoning on top. And pair with potatoes! View Recipe Save 03 of 21 Cream of Mushroom Chicken Dotdash Meredith Food Studios This chicken has a smooth, rich thick sauce to make it feel super indulgent, all thanks to the cream of mushroom soup. Add in extra sliced mushrooms to bulk it up and complement the flavors, and some green peas if you like. View Recipe Save 04 of 21 Easy Wild Rice Soup Soup Loving Nicole This veggie and rice soup also uses cream of mushroom to bring about fulfilling umami flavors. Add in bacon to get a more meaty type of soup, and have some fun with the veggies. View Recipe Save 05 of 21 Green Bean Casserole I SayMarie11 Who doesn't love green bean casserole? Especially during the holidays. But you can enjoy it year-round, and cream of mushroom soup is the all-star that helps make the casserole stick well together and shine. And it's ready in 35 minutes! Try one of Grandma's Best Casserole Recipes. View Recipe Save 06 of 21 Creamy Beef Tips with Egg Noodles dknight0909 You can totally use cream of mushroom in an egg noodle dish for a hearty mushroom flavor and thick, creamy sauce. When paired with beef tips, it adds a beefy, meaty type of texture you're going to appreciate, too. These cubed sirloin tips are baked in cream of mushroom soup, red wine, milk, and mixed with beef and beef onion soup mix. 13 Dinners That Start With a Bag of Egg Noodles View Recipe Save 07 of 21 Creamed Spinach II jag1165 "My kids absolutely love this simple, fast side dish. They actually believe if they go in a restaurant, spinach will be served as wonderful as this," says recipe creator LSCHOETTLER. View Recipe Save 08 of 21 Creamy Onion Soup Melissa Goff You may not think to use cream of mushroom for an onion soup, but you can and should! Feel free to add in cheese if you want a bit more flavor. Do go all in with seasonings, like salt and pepper, to keep it clean but tasteful. View Recipe Save 09 of 21 Simple Mac and Cheese Kansas Don't bother with the bechamel sauce for this macaroni and cheese. One can of condensed cream of mushroom soup sets this iconic pasta dish up, thanks to its rich base. View Recipe Save 10 of 21 Best Tuna Casserole Mackenzie Schieck Need another fish casserole idea? You won't be wrong with tuna casserole. The potato chips give the casserole a surprisingly crunchy crust. Add in some cheddar cheese and fresh mushrooms, too, and it'll be done in 35 minutes, which is pretty speedy. 21 Recipes That Start with Canned Tuna View Recipe Save 11 of 21 Savory Mushroom Soup fabeverydayblog Use cream of mushroom to whip up an even better mushroom soup that will hit the spot for an umami craving. Add in sour cream and green peas to make the soup even richer and creamier and give it a pop of color. It takes just 20 minutes, so it's an easy weeknight meal. These 20 Top-Rated Soups Give You Comfort by the Bowlful View Recipe Save 12 of 21 Slow Cooker Autumn Delight Ray W Riehemann For this meaty recipe, use a can of cream of mushroom soup with garlic and two cans of cream of mushroom soup in the original flavor to go with the tasty egg noodles. Beef cubes cook in the slow cooker for around five hours with the soups until they're fall-apart tender. View Recipe Save 13 of 21 Wilma's Fish Casserole Deb C Mushrooms taste great with fish, and cream of mushroom soup is a staple for casserole. So, whip up this fish casserole using the canned soup. Go for haddock for the fish, some fresh herbs, and buttery crackers and breadcrumbs. View Recipe Save 14 of 21 Easy Creamy Chicken Mushroom Sauce *~Lissa~* This decadent and silky sauce is perfect for any chicken dish. But this cheesy pasta sauce with chicken and mushrooms is so good you will want to eat every night of the week. Add in paprika for a touch of some spice and heat. View Recipe Save 15 of 21 Instant Pot Creamy Pork Chops fabeveryday Fresh mushrooms and onions give the sauce a homemade feel, while the canned soup provides a creamy, rich-tasting base. Serve over mashed potatoes or rice with a big ladleful of gravy. 15 Boneless Pork Chop Recipes for Quick Dinners View Recipe Save 16 of 21 Scalloped Potatoes au Gratin No need to make a white sauce for these scalloped potatoes. Condensed soup delivers loads of creamy richness. "This is the way my mom made scalloped potatoes," writes recipe submitter Barbara Burns. "Adding the optional ham slices to the bottom of the pan turns this into a main dish." View Recipe Save 17 of 21 Ground Beef Pinwheels with Mushroom Sauce Sarah Mason Single-serving sized, these pinwheels are great for keeping portions in check but still getting in filling protein. And the cream of mushroom sauce makes it feel hearty and dense, so it'll fill you up well and complement the beef flavor. It may look complicated, but this dish is done in 45 minutes! 21 Deliciously Different Things to Do With a Pound of Ground Beef View Recipe Save 18 of 21 Quick Chicken Divan Tara Want to get your kids to eat more greens? Well, kids love it because the broccoli is "hidden" under all the chicken, cream of mushroom soup, and cheese. Use shredded cheddar cheese for great flavor and add in some mayonnaise to help with thickening even further. Serve with some rice or potatoes. View Recipe Save 19 of 21 Grandma's Hamburger Hot Dish Yoly "My grandma made this recipe using the old stand-by hamburger and cream soups. We always ate it up!" – Jillieann Our 20 Best Grandma-Approved Recipes of All Time View Recipe Save 20 of 21 Creamy Chicken Pasta Here's another weeknight meals that's made faster and simpler by the addition of a can of cream of mushroom soup. Ready in about 30 minutes, this chicken pasta dish only calls for six ingredients, which makes it a budget-friendly dish, too. View Recipe Save 21 of 21 More Like This Chef John Chef John's King Ranch Chicken Casserole, pictured above 15 Filling Family Dinners That Won't Break the Bank 18 Cheap and Easy Dinners More Quick and Easy Dinner Recipes Explore more: Recipes Everyday Cooking Family-Friendly Recipes Family Dinners Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
